shrimp.name: Diffuse
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Lambertian Diffuse term. The diffuse color value is passed to the aov_surfacecolor, and the diffuse value to the aov_diffuse AOV presets. Pixie's diffuse shadeop has 2 forms, the first one with a single argument, with the surface normal N, the second form, with 3 arguments, allowing the surface position and angle (in radians) to be specified as well. If angle is 0, the normal single argument diffuse shadeop is used, otherwise the 3 arguments diffuse shadeop.
